About Me

Eshan Iyer is an 11th-grade student going to Frisco High School. He is currently 16 years old. Eshan loves to code innovative ideas and solve real-world issues. He is currently focusing his passion on data science, specifically machine learning. He is taking those skills currently to help the cause of oncology with his cancer detection program.

Portfolio Projects

hac-notifier

2

Can run in the background and let you know whenever your grades are updated. Works with all Frisco ISD students. Please report any issues in the issues tab of this repository. Check the README for instructions on how to use it. Thanks for checking this repository out.

fake-news-detection

2

A Flask webapp that detects fake news with a given text input using the power of Natural Language Processing. Deployment on Heroku failed due to the program's large memory consumption.
